title: Lose A Princess, Lose Your Head
description: Captain Regina Fitzwaters and Kapitan Maximillian Jaeger are unlikely partners, bound together by extraordinary circumstances. While lying low they accept a simple mission: To escort an Eressian Princess to meet her betrothed. Navigating a tangled web of shifting loyalties, conspiracies, and treason, Regina and Max must get the princess safely to the palace. Because in Eressia, if you lose a princess, you lose your head!
author: Alex Avrio
